---
title: "New Paper Accepted at ICSE 2024"
date: "2024-01-15"
description: "Our paper on build failure prediction has been accepted at the International Conference on Software Engineering (ICSE) 2024."
---

We are excited to announce that our paper "Predicting Build Failures Using Machine Learning Techniques" has been accepted at ICSE 2024. This work represents a significant advancement in our understanding of continuous integration systems and how we can make them more efficient.

The paper will be presented at the conference in April 2024 in Lisbon, Portugal.
